means: 受教育的，得到指示的，被委派的
教( instruct的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: "Tell them to hold all my calls, Theresa," she instructed her dresser.
sentence.Network_cn: “特雷莎，告诉他们我所有的电话都别挂。”她吩咐她的服装师。

sentence.Network_en: He instructed switchboard staff to divert all Laura's calls to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他让总机接线员将劳拉所有的电话都转给他。

sentence.Network_en: Change the filter cartridge as often as instructed by the manufacturer.
sentence.Network_cn: 按照生产厂家的使用说明，经常更换过滤筒。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Shortly before noon Edwina instructed Tottenhoe to advise the payroll department ., 快到中午时候 , 埃德温娜吩咐托顿霍去通知工资科.
从今天开始，每天一篇新概念英语三_英语杂谈... ... journalist 记者，新闻工作者 instructed 指示，受教育的 impatient 不耐烦的.
The doctor instructed him to go to bed and rest ., 医生嘱咐他卧床休息.
the younger brother was instructed to travel throughout the land mark his footsteps as he went about .年轻的兄弟按指示旅行整个大陆，四处走动留下他的脚印。

list.abs: 高二英语必修五单词列表_百度文库 ... certainty n. 确信 instruct v. 命令 responsible adj. 有责任的.
职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... instinctive 本能的，天性的 instruct 教(育)，指示，通知 instructor 指导者，教员，教练.
戴尔中文技术支持网站-论坛 ... Install 安装 Instructions 使用说明 Inverter 变极器.
电梯专业英语词汇（三） ... instructed person 受过训练的人员 instruction 指示，指令 instruction drawing 要领图.

entry.def: If you instruct someone to do something, you formally tell them to do it.

example.ex: The family has instructed solicitors to sue Thomson for compensation...
example.tran: 那家人已经指示律师起诉汤姆森,要求赔偿。

example.ex: 'Go and have a word with her, Ken,' Webb instructed...
example.tran: “肯,去和她谈谈吧,”韦布吩咐道。

entry.def: Someone who instructs people in a subject or skill teaches it to them.

example.ex: He instructed family members in nursing techniques.

means.word_mean: 1. (all used chiefly with qualifiers `well' or `poorly' or `un-') having received specific instruction;

auth_sentence.content: Louboutin then instructed her to hike up her skirt.
auth_sentence.res_content: Louboutin then instructed her to hike up her skirt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Louboutin then instructed her to hike up her skirt.

auth_sentence.content: It has instructed Peel Hunt to purchase the shares.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has instructed Peel Hunt to purchase the shares.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has instructed Peel Hunt to purchase the shares.

auth_sentence.content: Which is what I instructed Ms. Stanley to do .
auth_sentence.res_content: Which is what I instructed Ms. Stanley to do .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Which is what I instructed Ms. Stanley to do .

Sentence.sentence: in one study, people who were instructed to think about money before entering a cafe spent less times chatting with the other patrons and more time working.
